summary: Frontend testing completed for Turkish ERP Excel export feature using ExcelJS. All requested features verified: 1) Login successful, 2) Planlama tab with Planlanan İşler sub-tab working, 3) İş Emri Formu Yazdır (Excel) button visible and clickable without JS errors, 4) Grafik tab with Sarım Yönü Görseli upload area working.
critical_code_review_comments: PlanningDashboard.js correctly implements ExcelJS for Excel export with styled workbook, sections, and embedded sarım yönü image support
handleExportToExcel function properly handles base64 image embedding from order.graphicsData.wrapDirectionImage
Excel export gracefully handles missing wrapDirectionImage field - shows 'Görsel eklenmedi' text instead of crashing
File download uses file-saver library with proper fallback for iOS devices
WrapDirectionImageUpload component correctly implements image upload with cropping using react-easy-crop
All data-testid attributes properly implemented for testing: wrap-direction-upload, wrap-direction-upload-btn, wrap-direction-preview

success_rate.backend: N/A - Backend testing skipped as requested (Firebase-based React SPA)

seed_data_creation: None - used existing planned orders SP-0651, SP-0649 for testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Excel export using ExcelJS is working correctly. The export button appears only for planned orders (status: planned, production_started, shipping_ready, completed). Sarım Yönü Görseli upload feature in Grafik tab is working - allows image upload with cropping. Most orders don't have wrapDirectionImage yet as this is a new feature. The Excel export handles missing images gracefully.

planlama_tab_navigation.details: Planlama tab clickable and loads Üretim Planlama dashboard correctly

planlanan_isler_tab.details: Planlanan İşler tab shows 2 planned orders (SP-0651, SP-0649)

planned_order_selection.details: SP-0651 order selected and shows Planı Düzenle / Güncelle panel with all order details

excel_export_button_visible.details: İş Emri Formu Yazdır (Excel) button visible with green gradient styling and FileSpreadsheet icon

excel_export_no_js_errors.details: Clicked Excel export button - no JavaScript errors in console. Button triggers file download

grafik_tab_navigation.details: Grafik tab clickable and shows 41 orders in Grafik Bekleyenler

sarim_yonu_gorseli_visible.details: Sarım Yönü Görseli upload area visible with data-testid='wrap-direction-upload' and upload button showing 'Sarım Yönü Görseli Yükle'
